{{Infobox USB Hub |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = China |model = JB2007 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/23/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/China_JB2007 |sernum = |series = |usb_ver = 1.1 |conn = Female B |size_class = desktop |vendor_id = 05e3 |device_id = 0606 |vendor_id2 = |device_id2 = |fcc_id = |controller_num = |chip1 = unknown, epoxied to board;; |chip2 = unknown, epoxied to board;; |chip3 = |chip4 = |pwr_optional = true |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |ports = 7 |tt = |power_led = green |port_led = |flags = |is_manuf = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |availability = |eoldate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== this thing is probably rather common on ebay. it isn't a high-speed hub, despite lying about its capabilities to the host OS and (via the seller) to the purchaser. '''this thing is horrible. DO NOT BUY.''' "JB2007" is silkscreened on the top of the board... hence the name of this entry. :Both hub chips are epoxied to the board. This ''hub'' identifies to the host system as two separate 05e3:0606 devices.. however, the manufactuer identifies as '''ALCOR'''. The manufacturer has been marked as unknown due to this.. {{SCollapse | lsusb -v dump | 
Bus 002 Device 009: ID 05e3:0606 Genesys Logic, Inc. USB 2.0 Hub / D-Link DUB-H4 USB 2.0 Hub
